explorelist.title: Wallet
explorelist.content: Use your Blockchain Wallet to buy, sell, exchange, and transact bitcoin, ether, and bitcoin cash.

explorelist.title: Api
explorelist.content: Build apps to accept bitcoin payments, search for bitcoin transactions, access live bitcoin data, and more.

explorelist.title: Prices
explorelist.content: Find the top cryptocurrencies' market data including price charts and price lookup, market cap, and return on investments.

explorelist.title: Charts
explorelist.content: View bitcoin charts for historical data on unconfirmed transactions, market price, and more.
